scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.setup: npm run install-server && npm run install-client && npm run install-functions
scripts.docker-install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.netlify-build: npm run install-client && cd client && npm run build
scripts.render-build: npm install && npm run install-server && npm run install-client && npm run build && node ./server/scripts/ensure-uploads-directory.js
